title: Sekkachi Hakushaku to Jikan Dorobou
original_name: せっかち伯爵と時間どろぼう
sinopse: An unknown, tall-hatted noble. A lovely and beautiful high-class lady. A competitive and energetic high school girl. These three mismatched people each aim for one place, each with different reasons. Who is the man who waits for them there? Koji Kumeta writes a new world filled with glee and wonder!
